contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox county | name = Fier County | native_name = Qarku i Fierit | settlement_type = [[Counties of Albania|County]] | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_map = Albania location Fier.svg | image_shield = ALB Qarku i Fierit COA.png | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Fier County within Albania. | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = {{flag|Albania}} | subdivision_type1 =Number of [[Districts of Albania|Districts]] | subdivision_name1 = 3 | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = [[Capital (political)|Capital]] | seat = [[Fier]] | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1890 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = <ref name="INSTAT">{{cite web|url=http://www.instat.gov.al/graphics/doc/tabelat/Treguesit%20Sociale/Popullsia/POP%202009/t4%20.xls|title=POPULLSIA SIPAS PREFEKTURAVE, 2001-2010|publisher=Albanian Institute of Statistics|accessdate=2010-09-09}}</ref> | population_as_of = 2010 | population_total =374074 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = | blank_info_sec1 = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = [http://www.qarkufier.gov.al www.qarkufier.gov.al] | footnotes = }} The '''County of Fier''' ({{Lang-sq|Qarku i Fierit}}) is one of the 12 [[counties of Albania|counties]] of [[Albania]]. It consists of the districts of [[Fier District|Fier]], [[Lushnjë District|Lushnjë]] and [[Mallakastër District|Mallakastër]] and its capital is [[Fier]]. Fier's western edge is the shoreline of the [[Adriatic Sea]]. On land, it borders the following counties: *[[Tirana County|Tirana]]: north *[[Elbasan County|Elbasan]]: northeast *[[Berat County|Berat]]: east *[[Gjirokastër County|Gjirokastër]]: southeast *[[Vlorë County|Vlorë]]: south ==Administrative divisions== {| class="wikitable" width= "100%" |- ! width=20%|District ! width=20%|Capital ! width=15%|District<br>Population (2010)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.instat.gov.al/graphics/doc/tabelat/Treguesit%20Sociale/Popullsia/POP%202009/t2.xls|title=POPULLSIA SIPAS RRETHEVE, 2001-2010|publisher=Albanian Institute of Statistics|accessdate=2010-09-09}}</ref> ! width=10%|Area (km²) ! width=35%|Municipalities |- | [[Fier District]] || [[Fier]] || 199,442 || 785 ||[[Cakran]], [[Dërmenas]], [[Fier]], [[Frakull]], [[Kuman, Albania|Kuman]], [[Kurjan]], [[Levan, Albania|Levan]], [[Libofshë]], [[Mbrostar]], [[Patos]], [[Portëz]], [[Qendër, Fier|Qendër]], [[Roskovec]], [[Ruzhdie]], [[Strum, Albania|Strum]], [[Topojë]], [[Zharrëz]] |- | [[Lushnjë District]] || [[Lushnjë]] ||143,276 || 712 ||[[Allkaj]], [[Ballagat]], [[Bubullimë]], [[Divjakë]], [[Dushk]], [[Fier-Shegan]], [[Golem, Lushnjë|Golem]], [[Grabian]], [[Gradishtë]], [[Hysgjokaj]], [[Karbunarë]], [[Kolonjë, Lushnjë|Kolonjë]], [[Krutje]], [[Lushnjë]], [[Rremas]], [[Tërbuf]] |- | [[Mallakastër District]] || [[Ballsh]] ||31,356 || 393 || [[Aranitas]], [[Ballsh]], [[Fratar]], [[Greshicë]], [[Hekal]], [[Kutë]], [[Ngraçan]], [[Qendër, Mallakastër|Qendër]], [[Selitë, Mallakastër|Selitë]] |- |} ==See also== * [[Kutë]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.qarkufier.gov.al Regional Council of Fier] *[http://www.lgpa.al/files/GUIDA%20QARKU%20FIER.pdf Official Fier County Travel Guide] {{Counties of Albania}} {{Fier County}} {{Coord|40|45|N|19|35|E|display=title|scale:1000000}} [[Category:Fier County| ]] [[Category:Counties of Albania|Fier]] {{Fier-geo-stub}}
